content: But what you have to understand is that there are also people who DO have these dreams. And because of how incredibly easy it is to obtain a gun in this country, they are able to achieve this dream in living color, while we all watch helplessly. We say they were terrorists or mentally ill. Sometimes they are. And that begs the question: then why the hell did the American people, who have a palpable distrust of both of these groups, sell them a god damn firearm?
